hero.title: Image-based Cattle & Buffalo Breed Identification
hero.description: Empowering Field Level Workers (FLWs) to register animals with AI-driven breed suggestions. Seamless integration with Bharat Pashudhan App (BPA) for accurate, validated records.

aiPrediction.title: AI Prediction
aiPrediction.description: Upload cattle/buffalo images and get instant AI-driven breed suggestions with confidence scores.

manualOverrides.title: Manual Overrides
manualOverrides.description: FLWs can override AI suggestions and submit final breed data directly to BPA for validated records.

breedInfo.title: Breed Info & Gallery
breedInfo.description: Access breed galleries, descriptions, and resources for quick field reference and learning.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Sign in to the web app or download the mobile app to begin registering animals with AI-powered breed identification.
